channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1437620999827169281
item.description: #COVID19mx Dado el rezago en el flujo de información, hay que esperar 3 semanas después del regreso a clases presenciales para poder analizar su efecto en los datos abiertos. Llevamos apenas 2 semanas.

item.title: #pt @ 1437511609052696578
item.description:
Cinco meses de trabalho e muita ralação mas valeu a pena: site v2.0 no ar!
Mais bonito, mais moderno no front- e back-end, com novo schema de metadados, e pronto para levar a BD a novas alturas.
Usem sem juízo 😍 #bdmais #opendata #EconTwitter https://t.co/XduxiWnJhF

item.title: #en @ 1437497361761284100
item.description: A huge loss. Martin was brilliant & gave much to advance the #lidar community. He was a vocal (& sometimes abrasive) advocate for open data. @LAStools contributions are foundational to @OpenTopography. I'll miss catching up with him at meetings & workshops around the world. https://t.co/eGK41xGQSE

item.title: #it @ 1437440153706971139
item.description: Giuriste ed esperte di open data mi hanno dato la loro impressione su come funziona la trasparenza in Italia a partire dalle mie richieste di accesso FOIA. @vitalbaa mi ha spiegato che le ragioni del no sono infondate sul piano giuridico...

item.title: #en @ 1437429490913796100
item.description: Happy to be part of the Canadian Open Data Summit #CODS21 this week, talking about open data policies for the 24-hour city--a project I've been developing in collaboration with @CriemCirm + @MTL_2424 since last year, now at @uvadatascience. More info: https://t.co/UxsEXfHWV4 https://t.co/nYzp1ShjQj

item.title: #fi @ 1437289273942740996
item.description: Suomen postinumeroalueista selvästi suurin osuus, 24,3 %, pienten lasten kotitalouksia on Oulun Hiukkavaarassa. Tämän ja kymmeniä muita tietoja Suomesta löydät Paavo-postinumeroaluetilastoista. Aiheina mm.#väestö, #asuminen, #tulot ja työpaikat. #avoindata https://t.co/JoAQLsOsTd https://t.co/YioyIxAVCb

item.title: #en @ 1437264786719481858
item.description:
This past year we’ve been working to build dialogue with communities around the world, hosting forums on topics including colonialism in open data and challenging sexism and misogyny in the open mapping ecosystem.
Read more in our Annual Report https://t.co/xfqBjKNsyx https://t.co/im38qvB6qL

item.title: #de @ 1437097971842273281
#en @ 1437078435822809093
item.description:
BPD will stop at nothing to try to make people think there's a lot of crime in Burlington.
Weak effort, though. This appears to just be a low-quality PDF export of data that's been available on the city's "Open Data Portal" for years.
https://t.co/0mfKZ2F908

item.title: #de @ 1437076825231052806
item.description: Magdeburger*innen sollten nicht bei der Verwaltung um Daten betteln müssen. Darum setzen wir uns als Fraktion für mehr #OpenData in #Magdeburg ein. Das schafft Transparenz und neue Potenziale in unserer Stadt. https://t.co/aMhn2k6zep

item.title: #ja @ 1437067972942581762
#th @ 1437065737605025803
item.description: ไหนๆวันนี้ก็สตาร์ทเครื่องด่าล่ะ ขอด่าพรรคส้มต่ออีกสักประเด็น คือพรรคพยายามชูเรื่อง Open Data แต่ภายในพรรคแม่งยังไม่มีระบบ Open Data เลย ระบบสมุดพก สส. ที่ทำตอนอนาคตใหม่คือดีมากแต่ไม่สานต่อ เอาแค่รายชื่อกรรมการสรรหาผู้สมัคร กรรมการวินัยที่พิจารณาเรื่องงูเห่า ยังแทบไม่มีใครรู้เลยอะ

item.title: #fi @ 1437056698112430094
item.description:
@lasleh @hsfi #Scotland🏴󐁧󐁢󐁳󐁣󐁴󐁿 ottaa #RokotePassi käyttöön jo #Lokakuu’n alusta. Skotlannin tiedotuslinja ja politiikka on #OpenData.
#Englanti🏴󐁧󐁢󐁥󐁮󐁧󐁿 ei. Englannin päätöstä pidetään politisoituneena, lasten #Covid19Kids-tauti leviää kouluissa. Hallitus peitteli #DeltaVariant koululeviämisen tilastot. https://t.co/Vtq3I2UWsu

item.title: #en @ 1436999397116612612
item.description:
#Copernicus for #Wine🍷
Our #OpenData can be used to optimise winegrowers' grape production (see tweet ⬇️)
Experts estimate the 2020 US winemaking industry's loss due to West Coast #Wildfires at $ 3.7 Bn
⬇️#Sentinel2 view of #Oregon's main Pinot Noir production area on 4 Sept. https://t.co/U2fDcOXlUv

item.title: #de @ 1436955659640131584
item.description:

#FFD: FreeFlowOfData-VO #OpenData-#PSI-RL #DGA: DataGovernanceAct #DSA: DigitalServicesAct #DMA: DigitalMarketsAct #AIA: ArtificialIntelligenceAct #DataAct
Immer aber bleibt die #DSGVO "unberührt": https://t.co/OKDVU79S3A

item.title: #en @ 1436772696008937476
item.description: @drjohnm Open data is good, @drjohnm, but it is a weak defense of your work. You still need robust methods. You are still responsible. Peer reviewers have already found multiple classification errors. Those errors are serious and should be caught before dissemination.

item.title: #en @ 1436769387525017603
item.description: Feminism is not institutionalised Nadia, it’s a movement not a ministry. Different NGOs have different set of objectives. Can’t expect them to publish open data when da gov couldn’t even do that themselves. https://t.co/joTc0H7iA8

item.title: #en @ 1436708781195468803
item.description:
It is surprising to me — and quite sad actually— that someone at this level of science critiques our paper without reading it.
For if you had, you would have seen a link to the app that allows everyone to review the actual case forms.
Prof G … please, it’s open data. https://t.co/PUlTCNFukw

item.title: #en @ 1436696417872011275
item.description:
The official dashboard seems to have updated, so you can check some of the figures there: https://t.co/VA66NgQyO7
But its just that none of the Open Data files have been updated yet. Not sure if/when they will be released, but I'll update my page with them when I can!

item.description: @firassabiad Good luck @firassabiad. I will only congratulate you when and if you (1) succeed in your duties or (2) resign if you're not allowed. item.title: #en @ 1436565377593401348
item.description:
The @KiniNewsLab and @malaysiakini retired its Covid-19 tracker after 18 months, following the launch of the Covidnow website. https://t.co/Yoa25aUD7f

TQ for ur support. https://t.co/g7XXKSiYcY

item.title: #en @ 1436525082533261320
item.description:
Bon Moya's contribution to the PH government is incalculable. His advocacy of Open Data, Gov't is already enough to seal his legacy, but I think his greatest impact would be seen when the Unified Account Codes Structure (UACS) becomes fully operational as he envisioned it.
RIP.
